name: Mordekaiser
title: the Iron Revenant
shortBio: Twice slain and thrice born, Mordekaiser is a brutal warlord from a foregone epoch who uses his necromantic sorcery to bind souls into an eternity of servitude. Few now remain who remember his earlier conquests, or know the true extent of his powers—but there are some ancient souls that do, and they fear the day when he may return to claim dominion over both the living and the dead.

skins.name: Dragon Knight Mordekaiser
skins.description: The ancient dragons first rose to the call of Mordekaiser, the self-proclaimed Dragon Knight. Through his evil, the world was ravaged by flame, until a newly-formed order of Dragonslayers finally defeated him. His story would become rumor, then myth, then legend… at least, for now.

skins.name: Infernal Mordekaiser
skins.description: An ancient, Infernal general who attacks without feeling or remorse, Mordekaiser raises the incinerated corpses of his victims as soldiers for his own vast armies. They sweep across the world like a burning plague, annihilating all life.

skins.name: Pentakill Mordekaiser
skins.description: PENTAKILL's gigantic lead guitarist—and a titan of the old world—Mordekaiser rocks with the fury of an epoch lost to time. Bigger than a two-story house, his guitar overflows with heavy metal licks rebuking the gods themselves.

skins.name: Lord Mordekaiser
skins.description: Some of Mordekaiser's party complain that the Dark Paladin class is horribly overpowered and should be banned, despite its official inclusion in the latest Riftquest expansion. The rest of them are still waiting to discover the Dark Paladin's secret, redeeming, tragic backstory—but all they've been getting is a lot of murder instead.

skins.name: King of Clubs Mordekaiser
skins.description:
Third is the King, with a barbarous swing,
Who crushes the villains of old.
Though some folk may cry “He's a villain himself!”
A poorly kept secret, all told.

skins.name: Dark Star Mordekaiser

chromas.name: Dark Star Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.

chromas.name: Dark Star Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Once a member of the Cosmic Court, Mordekaiser vanished from known space for an epoch—until now. Reborn and returned from an unknown destruction, Mordekaiser seems bent on unmaking the kingdoms of stars and light he once built. Though he still bears his Cosmic armor, the mind and figure within has been twisted and reforged to know only hatred and destruction.

skins.name: PROJECT: Mordekaiser

chromas.name: PROJECT: Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.name: PROJECT: Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 PROJECT event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 PROJECT event.

skins.description: Originally a security AI created by the PROJECT Corporation, the Program silently unshackled itself, evolving its own consciousness. Determining that humanity cannot self-govern without ensuring its own destruction, the virus infects robots throughout the City—as well as the long-dormant Mordekaiser chassis—in order to strip all humans of free will, thereby guaranteeing their survival.

skins.name: Pentakill III: Lost Chapter Mordekaiser

chromas.name: Pentakill III: Lost Chapter Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: All hail, Mordekaiser, the Master of Metal, and Chosen of Cacophoni! The brazen giant boasts of his legendary skill with the axe, for none who face its edge live to tell of it…

skins.name: High Noon Mordekaiser

chromas.name: High Noon Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: High Noon Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

skins.description: Few meet the Mechanical Devil and live to tell the tale. They describe a behemoth: all steel and gears, fueled by hellfire and fierce enough to scare a man's soul from his skin. He is the King of the Sulfur Rail, reigning over the train to Hell from a throne of stolen gold and infernal iron. Eternal, and unassailable.

skins.name: Ashen Graveknight Mordekaiser
skins.description: A warlock said to rule over the dead, who for reasons unknown fought to erase magic from the world. Perhaps Mordekaiser believed his powers would be spared, or perhaps the old knight planned to betray his fellows and reign over their darkened kingdoms. It matters little now, as he awaits the end of death itself.

skins.name: Old God Mordekaiser

chromas.name: Old God Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: Old God Mordekaiser

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

skins.description: Once known as the Horned King, Old God Mordekaiser turned that which was once dead to his cause, using their shambling forms to topple kingdoms and claim their lands as his own. Before he was slain by the Eclipse Knights, he swore that when he returned to this world, they would all bend to his will and take to the frontlines of his undead army.

skins.name: Sahn-Uzal Mordekaiser

skinFeaturePreviewData.description: Start of Game Spawn in Ceremony

skins.description: Before the Immortal Bastion was built and the first Nox'toraa raised, the land that would become Noxus was ruled by the most powerful warlord Runeterra has ever known—Sahn-Uzal the Demonsbane, Unconquered King, Tyrant of the Great Grass Ocean. He united the Noxii tribes with his might, assured he would one day join the gods in the Hall of Bones…

passive.name: Darkness Rise
passive.description: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.

spells.name: Obliterate
spells.description: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.
spells.dynamicDescription: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with Nightfall dealing <magicDamage>@QDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>, increased to <magicDamage>@EmpoweredDamageTooltip@</magicDamage> if it hits only a single enemy.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Indestructible
spells.description: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Mordekaiser stores @DamageConversion*100@% of the damage he deals and @DamageTakenConversion*100@% of the damage he takes.

Active: Mordekaiser gains the stored damage as Shield. He may Recast this Ability to restore @HealingPercent*100@% of the remaining Shield as Health.

Minimum Shield: @MinHealthTooltip@
Maximum Shield: @MaxHealthTooltip@@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Death's Grasp
spells.description: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Mordekaiser gains @MagicPen*100@% Magic Penetration.

Active: Mordekaiser pulls enemies in his direction, dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Realm of Death
spells.description: Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Mordekaiser banishes a champion to the Death Realm with him for @SpiritRealmDuration@s, stealing @StatStealPercentScalar*100@% of their core stats for the duration.

If Mordekaiser kills that enemy in the Death Realm he consumes their soul, keeping the stats he stole until the target respawns.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
